text: This restaurant serves excellent west African food. Its best of you order ahead. Atmosphere is great, very nice bilingual French/English staff. i love the (Attieke- poisson) but we can have jollof rice,Ndole. ntaba ,makayabu, chkkwangue, fried plantain, Garba and many more
Excellent food and super friendly staff!  Food is authentic, well prepared, and reasonably priced.
Amazing food! Great service! The owner was very kind and hospitable, this was my first time eating African food I enjoyed it so much!
The food and service was amazing! The waiters were super nice and friendly. I will definitely go back.
